Version4:
https://ladsweb.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/archive/allData/464/
Satellites: 
- NOAA - [7,9,11,14,16,18,19]

Version5:
https://ladsweb.modaps.eosdis.nasa.gov/archive/allData/465/
Satellites:
- MetOp 1
- NOAA - [7,9,11,14,16,18,19]

Product is $SAT_$PRODUCT_$FORMAT
Default format is HDF and code is omitted from folder names. 
If the $FORMAT code is "_NC": NetCDF format 

AVH02C1: AVHRR Top-of-Atmosphere Reflectance Daily L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG
AVH09C1: AVHRR Atmospherically Corrected Surface Reflectance Daily L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG
AVH13C1: AVHRR Atmospherically Corrected Normalized Difference Vegetation Index Daily L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG
AVH15C1: AVHRR Atmospherically Corrected Leaf AreaIndex and Fraction of Absorbed Photosynthetically Active Radiation Daily L3 Global 0.05Deg CMG NetCDF
